comment: This song is one we end every Beer and Hymns with, and it's become our mantra. We know it's hyperbole . . . there will be more hard times, and the grief of the past year is still there. But I'm feeling the hopefulness of those refrains today.
amr:

      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (e / end-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (s / song
                        :mod (t / this))
